content: the small snail is the day 12 pattern for the spring 2024 pond pals mini amigurumi crochet along the final pattern there is a total of 12 mini amigurumi bugs birds and other animals in the crochet along the snail joins the dragonfly ant hummingbird worm turtle bee mallard butterfly frog bluebird and ladybug from the previous 11 days the small snail is about 4 tall with a spiral shell on its back small snail is available free at 5littlemonsters com or you can purchase the pond pals mini amigurumi ebook with all 12 patterns in an ad-free printable format
